metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010302 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
jhead 3.03 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: Denialof service. The component is: iptc.c Line 122 show_IPTC(). The attackvector is: the victim must open a specially crafted JPEG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010302` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1').
